title: Coronavirus: The State Bankruptcy Debate
description: States are facing massive shortfalls due to the coronavirus outbreak. Senate Majority leader Mitch McConnell has suggested letting states file for bankruptcy. On this episode, Kate and Luigi explain why the debate over McConnell's proposal is far more complicated than most people think.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (University of Chicago Podcast Network)
